Name: Configuration - Encrypt Section
Description: Encrypts several configuration sections for the specified file in a given directory.
Author: cjuroz

Parameters.Name: WebsiteDirectory
Parameters.Label: Website directory
Parameters.HelpText:
The path to the website physical directory that contains a `Web.Config` file. 

You can get the InstallationDirectoryPath like so `#{Octopus.Action[StepName].Output.Package.InstallationDirectoryPath}`

Parameters.Name: SectionsToEncrypt
Parameters.Label: Section to encrypt
Parameters.HelpText:
The name of the section in the web config to encrypt e.g. `appSettings`, `connectionStrings` etc.
For multiple sections, separate with a comma (,)

Parameters.Name: Provider
Parameters.Label: Provider Name
Parameters.HelpText: The provider to use for encryption

Parameters.Name: OtherFiles
Parameters.Label: Other Files
Parameters.HelpText: A list of other files in the `#{WebsiteDirectory}` folder that should be included when encrypting the specified `#{SectionToEncrypt}`. For example, `connectionStrings.config`. Values should be separated by a comma.
